Clip-it Belt - Retractable Wheelchair seatbelt | Samnang Nuonsinoeun

Clip-it Belt - Retractable Wheelchair seatbelt

December 02, 2024

Focus Areas

Industrial Design Product Development Sheet Metal Computer Aided Design Solidworks Prototyping

Description

Company: Shirley Ryan AbilityLab, Inc.

Website: https://www.sralab.org/

Project Timeline: August 2019 - October 2019

My Role

As an industrial designer, I conceptualized and developed the Clip-It Belt, an innovative accessory designed to address common issues with traditional belts.

Impact

The Clip-It Belt empowers individuals with limited hand and trunk mobility, fostering greater independence and confidence. By addressing an overlooked challenge, this product highlights the role of design in creating meaningful change in everyday lives.

Problem

Traditional belts often present challenges such as:

  • Difficulty in achieving a perfect fit
  • Inconvenience in adjusting the belt quickly
  • Potential damage to belt loops due to excessive force
  • Limited versatility in style and function

Solution

The Clip-It Belt was created to revolutionize the way we think about and use belts.

Key features of the design include:

Innovative Clip Mechanism

  • Allows for quick and easy adjustment
  • Provides a secure fit without the need for holes or a buckle

Versatile Design

  • Can be worn as a traditional belt or as a stylish accessory
  • Suitable for various clothing styles and occasions

User-Friendly

  • Simple to put on and take off
  • Eliminates the need for threading through belt loops

Durable Construction

  • Made with high-quality materials to ensure longevity
  • Designed to withstand daily wear and tear

Customizable

  • Available in different colors and materials to suit individual preferences
  • Potential for interchangeable clips for added personalization

The Clip-It Belt demonstrates a thoughtful approach to solving everyday problems through innovative industrial design. By reimagining a common accessory, this project showcases the ability to create functional, user-centric solutions that enhance daily life.
